channel.title: CVE Feed for WPDeveloper -- BetterDocs
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WPDeveloper -- BetterDocs

item.title: CVE-2024-43227|2024-08-13T13:48:16.497Z -- wpdeveloper -- betterdocs
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in WPDeveloper BetterDocs allows Stored XSS.This issue affects BetterDocs: from n/a through 3.5.8.

item.title: CVE-2024-43129|2024-08-13T13:40:57.877Z -- wpdeveloper -- betterdocs
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in WPDeveloper BetterDocs allows PHP Local File Inclusion.This issue affects BetterDocs: from n/a through 3.5.8.

item.title: CVE-2024-43227|2024-08-12T21:07:03.693Z -- wpdeveloper -- betterdocs
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in WPDeveloper BetterDocs allows Stored XSS.This issue affects BetterDocs: from n/a through 3.5.8.

item.title: CVE-2024-30226|2024-06-04T17:38:39.520Z -- wpdeveloper -- betterdocs
item.description: Deserialization of Untrusted Data vulnerability in WPDeveloper BetterDocs.This issue affects BetterDocs: from n/a through 3.3.3.

item.title: CVE-2024-30226|2024-08-02T01:25:03.522Z -- wpdeveloper -- betterdocs
item.description: Deserialization of Untrusted Data vulnerability in WPDeveloper BetterDocs.This issue affects BetterDocs: from n/a through 3.3.3.

item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in WPDeveloper BetterDocs allows PHP Local File Inclusion.This issue affects BetterDocs: from n/a through 3.5.8.
